34728667,"Children of Blood and Bone (Legacy of Orïsha, #1)",1250170974,9781250170972,,B074DZ9MKS,ATVPDKIKX0DER,US,https://i.gr-assets.com/images/S/compressed.photo.goodreads.com/books/1516127989l/34728667._SX98_.jpg,https://i.gr-assets.com/images/S/compressed.photo.goodreads.com/books/1516127989l/34728667._SX50_.jpg,2018,3,6,Henry Holt Company,eng,false,"They killed my mother.
They took our magic.
They tried to bury us.

Now we rise.

Zélie Adebola remembers when the soil of Orïsha hummed with magic. Burners ignited flames, Tiders beckoned waves, and Zélie’s Reaper mother summoned forth souls.

But everything changed the night magic disappeared. Under the orders of a ruthless king, maji were killed, leaving Zélie without a mother and her people without hope.

Now Zélie has one chance to bring back magic and strike against the monarchy. With the help of a rogue princess, Zélie must outwit and outrun the crown prince, who is hell-bent on eradicating magic for good.

Danger lurks in Orïsha, where snow leoponaires prowl and vengeful spirits wait in the waters. Yet the greatest danger may be Zélie herself as she struggles to control her powers and her growing feelings for an enemy.","{""id"":{""_"":""55911580"",""type"":""integer""},""books_count"":{""_"":""82"",""type"":""integer""},""best_book_id"":{""_"":""34728667"",""type"":""integer""},""reviews_count"":{""_"":""477481"",""type"":""integer""},""ratings_sum"":{""_"":""668009"",""type"":""integer""},""ratings_count"":{""_"":""162817"",""type"":""integer""},""text_reviews_count"":{""_"":""24214"",""type"":""integer""},""original_publication_year"":{""_"":""2018"",""type"":""integer""},""original_publication_month"":{""_"":""3"",""type"":""integer""},""original_publication_day"":{""_"":""6"",""type"":""integer""},""original_title"":""Children of Blood and Bone"",""original_language_id"":{""type"":""integer"",""nil"":""true""},""media_type"":""book"",""rating_dist"":""5:69622|4:55861|3:25474|2:8173|1:3687|total:162817"",""desc_user_id"":{""_"":""30958385"",""type"":""integer""},""default_chaptering_book_id"":{""type"":""integer"",""nil"":""true""},""default_description_language_code"":{""nil"":""true""},""work_uri"":""kca://work/amzn1.gr.work.v1.QdRHnvY3smKRTm4Ur-W40g""}",4.10,544,Hardcover,,138377,20005,https://www.goodreads.com/book/show/34728667-children-of-blood-and-bone,https://www.goodreads.com/book/show/34728667-children-of-blood-and-bone,"{""author"":{""id"":""16642745"",""name"":""Tomi Adeyemi"",""role"":"""",""image_url"":{""_"":"" https://images.gr-assets.com/authors/1573251060p5/16642745.jpg "",""nophoto"":""false""},""small_image_url"":{""_"":"" https://images.gr-assets.com/authors/1573251060p2/16642745.jpg "",""nophoto"":""false""},""link"":""https://www.goodreads.com/author/show/16642745.Tomi_Adeyemi"",""average_rating"":""4.06"",""ratings_count"":""198920"",""text_reviews_count"":""29941""}}","

Legacy of Orïsha "",""description"":"" Tomi Adeyemi conjures a stunning world of dark magic and danger in her West African-inspired Legacy of Orisha fantasy series. Zélie Adebola remembers when the soil of Orïsha hummed with magic before a ruthless king ordered all maji killed, leaving Zélie without a mother and her people without hope. Now Zélie fights to bring back magic and strike against the monarchy while struggling to control her powers--and her growing feelings for an enemy... ""Adeyemi keeps it fresh with an all-black cast of characters, a meaningful emphasis on fighting for justice, a complex heroine saving her own people, and a brand of magic made more powerful by the strength of heritage and ancestry. Perfect for fans of the expansive fantasy worlds of Leigh Bardugo, Daniel José Older, and Sabaa Tahir.""--Booklist (starred review, on Children of Blood and Bone) "",""note"":""
